channel.title: Which VPS to choose? [2015]
channel.description:
Hello everyone,
A few friends and I are starting up a RSPS 718 (Rune-Evo 3) more or less just for fun but if other people join that would just be a bonus. I am currently looking for a reliable VPS, I have done quite a bit of googling around but most forum post are out of date. I was going to try Trentahost but it seems recently they have ALOT of downtime. I also have heard good things about VPSLand, However like I said most of these post I read are from 2010-2012.
If anyone could post some VPS's that they have used in the past for hosting a RSPS it would be greatly appreciated!
Thank you everyone! :D
PS. What size VPS would I need? (Server file is 855mb)

item.title: Which VPS to choose? [2015]
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Personally, ovh is very cheap, you get what you pay for.

In my experience, running a server is all about the uplink (bandwidth/speed). More than it is about the RAM anyway. Any server source ive hosted or messed about with sits at 300~mb RAM usage on a linux distro. Never goes above 512. You should be safe with 1G memory. As for uplink, 1Gbps is good but i’ve seen other places with more for cheap.

Saying that, if you are really serious about running on a professional gaming server:
http://www.soyoustart.com/en/innovation-zone/game-servers/

Is the best value price i’ve seen.

Check out lowendbox occasionally for some great offers.

Read full topic

item.title: Which VPS to choose? [2015]
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

I agree with them if you have any experience with Debian Distros use ovh.com. I have a few cheap servers there ubuntu 14.04.

If you have any questions just google it if all else fails.

Read full topic

item.title: Which VPS to choose? [2015]
item.dc:creator: @stCky stCky
item.description:
@stCky wrote:

DigitalOcean.

Bigger is better, you’ll want more than 5-10 one day.

Read full topic

item.title: Which VPS to choose? [2015]
item.dc:creator: @doctorgetsum doctorgetsum
item.description:
@doctorgetsum wrote:

Alright tonight I am going to purchase a VPS from OVH could anybody tell me which vps I need for apx 5-10 people? The server file is 855mb so should VPS Classic 1 work? (1 GB Ram, 10 GB HDD, 100 Mbps Bandwidth) or do I need something more like VPS Classic 2 (2 GB Ram, 25 GB HDD, 100 Mbps Bandwidth)

Thanks again everyone.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

http://www.ovh.com/us/index.xml

I personally use Staminus but have used OVH in the past, good provider.
